name: Jim The Space Jelly
description:
Jim likes fruits so help him out. 

Rotate the world with your finger. Press and drag and bada bing bada bum. 

Avoid almost every object such as water, mountain, lava, crater...

And eat the fruits to get fat so you can fall of the planet and whole universe can shame you because of your belly.

This game is made in 12 hours with lots of pain.  

Webgl build has got some problems and if you are going to play in a mobile device you might have resolution issues unless your device's screen is big as Jim's belly. And the game might crash. So you better play the Windows Build in PC.

How do we fit to the theme? When you walk straight on a planet, you will turn back to your starting point. 

All the game assets except sounds and music are made by us:

Bukalemoon: Ege Doğrul and Mahmut Esat Yerlikaya.

Music from Zapsplat.com
